padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc110207" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="John E Buoy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/34307"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.34307.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="John E Buoy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Gyan-41221.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41221.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gyan"title="Gyan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma110207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd110207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/34307">John E Buoy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2010-11-10">11/10/10 13:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, I just received my bottle. I love it.<br />
<br />
I find it to be a cross between Dunhill edition and Penhaligons Blemheim Bouquet, both of which I love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="7052"comment_id="110207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Opus-1870-7052.html?ccid=110207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent93080" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc93080" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sherapop"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.17027.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sherapop" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-No-5-L-Eau-38543.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38543.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel No 5 L'Eau"title="Chanel No 5 L'Eau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma93080ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd93080" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17027">sherapop</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2010-08-01">08/01/10 16:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligon OPUS 1870 opens briefly with a masculine demeanor: somewhat aromatic, with the characteristic coriander of many colognes. Shortly thereafter, however, this morphs into a lovely floral woody fragrance entirely suitable for women. In fact, if it were possible to experience the drydown in isolation from the opening, I would definitely have guessed that this was a creation intended primarily for women.<br />
<br />
The floral and the woody elements are perfectly balanced into a subtle, slightly oriental composition. The incense is not at all heavy, serving to complement not dominate the other notes. <br />
<br />
Unfortunately, the staying power of this relatively low sillage fragrance is not that good. Otherwise I would have considered adding OPUS 1870 to my wish list. Still, it's quite likeable!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="7052"comment_id="93080"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Opus-1870-7052.html?ccid=93080#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc163813" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jack_Hunter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/51999"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.51999.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jack_Hunter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma163813ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd163813" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/51999">Jack_Hunter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-07-10">07/10/11 03:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have tried most of the range from this house and Opus 1870 for me stood out as the best. It opens with a really good peppery cedar wood scent with a beautiful Rose fragrance coming through in the background. As time moves on the Rose comes to the forefront and the woods move into the background. <br />
<br />
 I find the scent elegant and refined and also restrained in the manner that it is never overwhelming but just compliments the wearer perfectly. A great woody floral that I found worthy of a purchase of a 100ml bottle and one that I am glad is part of my wardrobe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="7052"comment_id="163813"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Opus-1870-7052.html?ccid=163813#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent535618" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc801632" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leopold"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1053054"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1053054.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leopold" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/James-Heeley/Cardinal-7844.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7844.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cardinal"title="Cardinal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma801632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd801632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1053054">Leopold</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-03-13">03/13/17 04:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Now that's a strange one. It's amongst my favourite fragrances but I don't have it and I never had it. I actually got samples so I could try it on various occasions. What can I say? I love it. It's fresh, it's woody. It's not generic. It's classy. I love the Penhaligon's image and packaging in general but this one is my favourite. So why I never bought it? Because it's expensive but projection and longevity are a disaster. And apparently a lot of people agree on that. I want this perfume and I'll buy it one day for sure. I'm just waiting for an opportunity to get it cheaper because it's performance does not match its price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="7052"comment_id="801632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Opus-1870-7052.html?ccid=801632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="7052" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent714611" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc714611" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cizekon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1004149"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cizekon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lanvin/Lanvin-L-Homme-6094.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6094.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lanvin L'Homme"title="Lanvin L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma714611ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd714611" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1004149">cizekon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-06-13">06/13/16 12:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a scent begginer, I lately felt in love with the house of Penhaligons, especially with their Endymion and Esprit du Roi. For that reason, I was really curious about this one.<br />
<br />
The scent itself is quite interesting - fresh and clean mix of citruses, pepper and spicies that smells really gently. Totally unisex. <br />
<br />
Unfortunately, it disappeared almost immediately - after 30 minutes I wasnt able to notice anything. I had to give the bottle back, since Im not willing to pay for the fragrances with non-existing longevity and sillage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="7052"comment_id="714611"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Opus-1870-7052.html?ccid=714611#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent893131" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc893131" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TonyTheTiger"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1091705"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1091705.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TonyTheTiger" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rosendo-Mateu-Olfactive-Expressions/Rosendo-Mateu-No-5-Floral-Amber-Sensual-Musk-46115.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46115.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rosendo Mateu N 5 Floral, Amber, Sensual Musk"title="Rosendo Mateu N 5 Floral, Amber, Sensual Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma893131ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd893131" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1091705">TonyTheTiger</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-24">12/24/17 11:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Preamble: So many reviews say it has performance issues yet the longevity rating here is pretty good. This my clear it up...<br />
<br />
This was one of the first frags I bought after getting into them properly earlier this year so I've had some time with it now. I purchased it off the opening on a cardboard strip (school boy error I know!) The open stood out from everything else I has tried that day. <br />
<br />
Has 2 distinct phases the spicy opening is great but unfortunately short lived. The drydown is a rose musk and is _very_ long lasting. The drydown is synthetic smelling and has a plastic/saliva edge to it which I find unpleasant - it's not the smell I signed up for! The problem is that if I respray to get the opening again the drydown builds and builds and becomes sickly :/<br />
<br />
Even though I initially fell in love with this frag it's officially going down as a dislike now. I wore it last night to see if my opinion had changed, unfortunately not, the overall wearing experience was a 4/10 and I don't think I'll actually wear it again considering I've picked up so many awesome frags since then.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="7052"comment_id="893131"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Opus-1870-7052.html?ccid=893131#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent794356" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc794356" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MountainviewK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1046551"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MountainviewK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geo-F-Trumper/Curzon-Cologne-4998.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4998.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Curzon Cologne"title="Curzon Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma794356ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd794356" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1046551">MountainviewK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-02-19">02/19/17 08:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me, this is a strange one. When I spray it on I get a nice woodsy smell - for about two seconds - and then it seems to disappear. It becomes a skin scent almost immediately. When I put my nose to skin I get a pleasant woodsy, floral fragrance but there is almost no fragrance there. This problem is probably particular to me, but there it is. Although I like the smell I have to rate it a dislike due to the extraordinarily weak projection and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="7052"comment_id="794356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Opus-1870-7052.html?ccid=794356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent276657" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc276657" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mejohann"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/196086"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.196086.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mejohann" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lubin/Black-Jade-13013.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13013.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Jade"title="Black Jade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma276657ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd276657" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/196086">mejohann</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-08-16">08/16/12 01:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It must just be me, but this smelled exactly like a pet shop that I spent many hours of my childhood in. The wood shavings in the bottom of dog and rodent cages? Yeah  . . . it smells exactly like Opus. I had very high hopes, but I could NOT get past the connection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="7052"comment_id="276657"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Opus-1870-7052.html?ccid=276657#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent283869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc283869" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fezziwig"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/134858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.134858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fezziwig" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Essenza-di-Colonia-9829.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9829.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Essenza di Colonia"title="Essenza di Colonia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma283869ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd283869" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); Too 'Hot' &amp; Spicy for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="7052"comment_id="283869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Opus-1870-7052.html?ccid=283869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="7052" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.48133.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Hermes/Hermessence-Cardamusc-48133.html#cc2367117"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Herms</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Hermessence Cardamusc</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="Cardamusc is a beautiful aromatic cardamon softened with powdery musk.         <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="Mmm, Pierre Guillaume Paris Un Crime Exotique 12.1 sounds right up my alley... But I came here to agree with you that Milano Fragranze Panettone is extra nice this time of year... ">by
            <em>krukmary</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.1061423.jpg"

    </div>
            <div style="margin-left: -0.65rem" id="anchormehere45646">

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
